You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
INDUSTRIES COMMON FEATURES GUIDE
Action Launcher

Add actions in the Action Launcher Lightning web component so that your users can search for and launch an action easily. Action Launcher helps your users to resolve customer requests and issues quickly and deliver better customer service. For example, users can initiate a fee-reversal flow or launch a service-order action from Action Launcher.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Starter, Professional, Enterprise, and Unlimited Editions with the required add-ons

You can launch these types of actions through Action Launcher:

Active screen flows, field service mobile flows, and autolaunched flows
Aura components
Button- and link-based actions or WebLinks
Flow orchestrations
OmniScripts
Quick actions

Here are a few points to remember about actions.

Autolaunched flows don’t require user input.
Action Launcher supports record-based OmniScripts that are created using Salesforce OmniStudio and file-based or out-of-the-box OmniScripts.

To associate actions with a record page, create an Action Launcher deployment.

Action Launcher Add-Ons and Permissions
Users access Action Launcher in their Salesforce org through supported editions, add-ons, and permissions.
Create an Action Launcher Deployment
Create a deployment that includes the component settings for the Action Launcher component. The settings determine the actions, such as flows, flow orchestrations, OmniScripts, and quick actions, which users can initiate from the Action Launcher search results. The Action Launcher component includes RecordAction junction objects, which associate an action with the parent record.
Add the Action Launcher Component to a Page
Make the Action Launcher component available to your users by adding the component to the required Lightning record page and selecting a deployment or service catalog. Users can then search for and launch the actions included in the deployment or the service processes included in the service catalog.
Use a Standard Action Launcher Deployment
Save the time and effort to configure Action Launcher for your contact center agents. The deployments come preconfigured with context objects, actions, and frequently used actions that you can easily modify to meet your business requirements.
Integrate Service Catalog with Action Launcher
Help your contact center agents (CCAs) to search for and launch service processes instantly through Action Launcher. Service processes use OmniScripts to provide a smooth and effortless customer service experience to CCAs.
Provide Access to OmniScripts
Give standard users or contact center agents (CCA) access to OmniScripts so that the users can see OmniScripts in the Action Launcher search results.
Launch Actions
Complete your work quickly by launching actions easily from the Action Launcher component.
Launch Service Processes
Efficiently assist customers by quickly launching service processes from Action Launcher.
Configure Action Launcher in Your Experience Cloud Site
To help people launch actions through Action Launcher without logging in to Salesforce, add Action Launcher to your Experience Cloud site.
Edit an Action Launcher Deployment
Modify the type of actions, the context, and the actions available for your users in a deployment.
Delete an Action Launcher Deployment
Delete the deployments that are no longer required.
